Add an alias

### Synopsis

Add an alias.
The alias name must be unique and not already used by a table.

```
anyquery alias add [alias] [table] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for add
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -c, --config string   Path to the configuration database
```
